team_news.title: Red Dragons FC Signs Star Forward
team_news.description: Red Dragons FC has announced the signing of a prolific forward who is expected to strengthen their attacking lineup.

team_news.title: Injury Update: Key Player Returns to Training
team_news.description: Good news for Red Dragons FC fans as their star midfielder has returned to training following a brief injury layoff.

team_news.title: Green Eagles FC Unveils New Stadium Plans
team_news.description: Exciting times ahead for Green Eagles FC as the club reveals plans for a state-of-the-art stadium that will be the envy of the league.

team_news.title: Manager's Contract Extension Confirmed
team_news.description: Green Eagles FC secures the services of their manager for another three years after an impressive season performance.

team_news.title: Youth Academy Graduates Shine in First Team Debut
team_news.description: Silver Sharks FC's commitment to youth development pays off as two academy graduates impress in their debut match for the first team.

team_news.title: Club Captain Extends Contract
team_news.description: Silver Sharks FC captain commits his future to the club by signing a contract extension, delighting fans and teammates alike.
